item.title: Behemoth 2 - OverTheWire
item.author: Author
item.description: Behemoth 2 - OverTheWire Intro The are more than one way to solve this challenge, and me being me I chose the hard way. After finally solving this challenge it was time to read other peoples writeups, as usual. I will share the easy way at the end, but I think you could learn a thing or two from the way I solved it. To start I decided to directly go and reverse the binary since Behemoth doesn’t offer any source code.
